snippet: All Sunday afternoon, games moved crisply as the National Football League’s regular officials behaved authoritatively and with confidence. But the day was not without a few missed calls.
abstract: Judy Battista On Pro Football column highlights return of the regular NFL officials; notes officials missed some calls, as they will every week, but none were embarrassing.
lead_paragraph: All Sunday afternoon, games moved crisply as the National Football League’s regular officials behaved authoritatively and with confidence. But the day was not without a few missed calls.

headline.seo: With Regular N.F.L. Officials, a Return to Normalcy With a Few Hiccups
headline.main: With Regular Officials, a Return to Normalcy With a Few Hiccups
headline.print_headline: A Return to Normalcy, With a Few Hiccups
